title: How To Add a Speed Control to a Cassette Player | Tape Tutorial Mod DIY

last_post.content:
To passively collect air pollution over time, I've been thinking about speed-modding a cassette player into a "videocamera" for dust.

For ex, I could cut an aperture in the side of the case, add sticky tape reels instead of a cassette, and speed-mod the servos to make it very slow.

I could point the aperture forward when riding the bicycle. After the ride, I would un-roll the tape (yes, losing some particles) and have a record of particles in the air along the ride

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FZD7m-z0Ejk

title: I don't know who proved Fermat's Last Theorem. All I know is, it wasn't Fermat. - r/mathmemes

last_post.content:
@jmw150 Repost of THE D&D ALIGNMENT CHART OF “HOW TO GET A THEOREM NAMED AFTER YOU” with image description.

Possible source of the image with some discussion: https://libreddit.strongthany.cc/r/mathmemes/comments/y3215w/i_dont_know_who_proved_fermats_last_theorem_all_i/

So, Ω₄(n) is diffeomorphic to the space of quaternion-unitary maps ℍⁱ ⊕ {0} → {0} ⊕ℍⁱ, or simply quaternion-unitary maps ℍⁱ → ℍⁱ. Quaternion-unitary maps are the obvious generalization of unitary maps from ℂ to ℍ. The quaternion-unitary maps ℍⁱ → ℍⁱ form a compact Lie group called the 'quaternionic unitary group' or 'compact symplectic group' Sp(i):

https://ncatlab.org/nlab/show/compact+symplectic+group
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Symplectic_group#Sp(n)

So, Ω₄(n) is diffeomorphic to this group!

(13/n)

title: Development of an Offline-Friend Addiction Questionnaire (O-FAQ): Are most people really social addicts? - Behavior Research Methods

last_post.content:
A fantastic way to make an important point. Researchers took items from widely-used scales of "social media addiction," and reworded them to be about spending time offline with friends. Using parallel criteria, they discovered that 69% of people are addicted to spending time with friends.

"Readers should approach our measure with a level of skepticism that should be afforded to current social media addiction measures."

last_post.content:
Since AWS added Ray as a distributed engine option in AWS Glue I’ve been experimenting & exploring Ray. I had kind of not payed Ray any attention because every mention of it included some bullshit about hyperparameter tuning or AI. So I assumed I wasn’t interested. Individual accounts are viewed through a page for each handle. For example ours is:
https://justmytoots.com/@noyovo@rage.love

It also seems useful not just for showcasing your own stuff, but for trying to look through other people's stuff. Therefore it's probably worth giving a heads up to anyone who *wouldn't* like that that this tool exists. Don't know anything about the possibility of opting out as an individual or an instance.

title: Catastrophe #88: The Texas Legislature Returns for a Brutal Year

last_post.content:
Other bills attempt to capitalize on the moral panic around #drag queens, simultaneously using it as a way to attack both #LGBTQIA culture as a whole and the ability of #transgender people to participate in public life. HB 643 from Representative Jared Patterson broadly seeks to ban anyone from “performing” in public when #children are present if the performer’s clothing doesn’t match conservative norms for their assigned #gender at birth. It’s so broadly written, in fact, that experts are concerned it could even ban #trans people from performing at major league sporting events or all-ages concerts. Venues found to be in violation would face misdemeanor charges. 

“That could literally mean a trans person doing standup at a comedy show would then turn it into a sexually oriented business,” @esqueer said.

From “Catastrophe 88” at @TexasObserver https://www.texasobserver.org/texas-legislature-preview-2023/

title: Great Chain of Agents: The Role of Metaphorical Representation of Agents in Conversational Crowdsourcing

last_post.content:
Forget human metaphors for software agents. Why not God metaphors?

Here's a paper that actually tested this! (Jung et al, CHI 22, https://dl.acm.org/doi/fullHtml/10.1145/3491102.3517653 )

Sample dialog from their protocol: "Greetings, I am the lord thy god. You shall help researchers at a university by participating in this research."

Their deadpan conclusion:
"an agent metaphor that locates higher than Human in the Great Chain of Being framework may disappoint workers in the system's ability due to high expectations"

tldr.nettime is an instance for artists, researchers, and activists interested in exploring the intersections of technology, culture, and politics.

It has grown out of nettime-l, one of the longest-running mailing lists on the net .

- The character count per message is higher — 2000 chars.
- You can choose whether your post is public or visible only on tldr's local timeline.
